member.name: T:BaGetter.Web.PackageContentController
member.summary: The Package Content resource, used to download content from packages. See: https://docs.microsoft.com/nuget/api/package-base-address-resource

member.name: M:BaGetter.Web.PackageContentController.DownloadPackageAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A token to cancel the task.
member.returns: The requested package in an octet stream, or 404 not found if the package isn't found.

member.name: T:BaGetter.Web.PackageMetadataController
member.summary: The Package Metadata resource, used to fetch packages' information. See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/api/registration-base-url-resource

member.name: T:BaGetter.Web.ServiceIndexController
member.summary: The NuGet Service Index. This aids NuGet client to discover this server's services.

member.name: P:BaGetter.Web.Helper.ApplicationVersion.Present
member.summary: Indicates if all version information was given during build process.

member.name: P:BaGetter.Web.Helper.ApplicationVersion.InformationalVersion
member.summary: The version with additional information e.g. 7.8.9+commitHash

member.name: T:BaGetter.Web.OperationCancelledMiddleware
